scripts.build:debug: npm run typecheck && esbuild index.ts --bundle --outfile=build/index.js --format=iife --platform=browser && mkdirp ./build && bls-sdk-ts build index.ts -o build -f debug.wasm && cp public/index.html build/ && cp public/style.css build/ || true
scripts.build:release: npm run typecheck && esbuild index.ts --bundle --minify --outfile=build/index.js --format=iife --platform=browser && mkdirp ./build && bls-sdk-ts build index.ts -o build -f bless-anime-game.wasm && cp public/index.html build/ && cp public/style.css build/ || true
